amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce total appropriations to the Environmental Protection Agency by $1,869,087,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 77 printed in House Report 115-297 to reduce total appropriations to the Environmental Protection Agency by $1,869,087,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A100) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 260 (Roll no. 492).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
